{"id":992931672,"question_id":2,"lang":"python","lang_name":"Python","time":"1Â year","timestamp":1689188056,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"55 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/992931672/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Two Numbers","memory":"13.4 MB","code":"# Definition for singly-linked list.\n# class ListNode(object):\n#     def __init__(self, val=0, next=None):\n#         self.val = val\n#         self.next = next\nclass Solution(object):\n    def addTwoNumbers(self, l1, l2):\n      # declare\n      carry = 0\n      curr = ListNode()\n      ans = curr\n      \n      # logic\n      while l1 or l2:\n        val1 = l1.val if l1 else 0\n        val2 = l2.val if l2 else 0\n        \n        sum = val1 + val2 + carry\n        carry = sum // 10\n        sum %= 10\n        \n        l1 = l1.next if l1 else None\n        l2 = l2.next if l2 else None\n        \n        ans.val = sum\n        if l1 or l2:\n          ans.next = ListNode()\n          ans = ans.next\n        \n      if carry:\n        ans.next = ListNode(carry)  \n      # return\n      return curr","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-two-numbers","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
